  • Methodendetails

    • encryptWithKey

      public static byte[] encryptWithKey(byte[] key, byte[] data, Version version) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Encrypt data using a secret key.
      Parameter:
      key - the secret key
      data - the data to encrypt
      version - the version
      Gibt zurück:
      encrypted data
      Löst aus:
      GeneralSecurityException - if something went wrong in a class in the security framework
      IllegalArgumentException - if the key has the wrong length

    • decryptWithKey

      public static byte[] decryptWithKey(byte[] key, byte[] data) throws DecryptException, GeneralSecurityException
      Decrypt data using a secret key.
      Parameter:
      key - the secret key
      data - the data to decrypt
      Gibt zurück:
      decrypted data
      Löst aus:
      DecryptException - if the data could not be decrypted
      GeneralSecurityException - if something went wrong in a class in the security framework
      IllegalArgumentException - if the key has the wrong length

    • verifyWithKey

      public static boolean verifyWithKey(byte[] key, byte[] data) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Verify encrypted data using a secret key.
      Parameter:
      key - the secret key
      data - the data to verify
      Gibt zurück:
      true if secret key, authenticity and integrity are okay
      Löst aus:
      GeneralSecurityException - if something went wrong in a class in the security framework
      IllegalArgumentException - if the key has the wrong length
